dependencies: Terraform CLI v1.7.4 (Dockerfile: ENV TERRAFORM_VERSION=1.7.4; installs terraform binary)
AWS CLI v2 (Dockerfile: downloads and installs awscliv2.zip)
architectural_resources: CI/CD pipeline (GitHub Actions) that runs terraform init/validate/plan and then terraform destroy (note: workflow step labeled 'Terraform Apply' actually runs destroy)
Infrastructure-as-Code project intended to provision cloud resources via Terraform (./infra), but no *.tf files were found in the repository snapshot
AWS account credentials/secrets used by pipeline (AWS_ACCESS_KEY, AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY in workflow env)
Containerized tooling image for infra operations (Dockerfile installs Terraform + AWS CLI)

ECS task definition-like JSON template (infra/config/vars.env contains containerDefinitions/family fields), implying AWS ECS/Fargate usage and container image deployment (e.g., nginx:latest referenced)
